remarks: The left projection function (for a direct product of group subspaces). (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Oct-2015.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 21-Apr-2016.)
statement:
pj1fval.v $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
pj1fval.a $e |- .+ = ( +g ` G ) $.
pj1fval.s $e |- .(+) = ( LSSum ` G ) $.
pj1fval.p $e |- P = ( proj1 ` G ) $.
pj1val $p |- ( ( ( G e. V /\ T C_ B /\ U C_ B ) /\ X e. ( T .(+) U ) ) -> ( ( T P U ) ` X ) = ( iota_ x e. T E. y e. U X = ( x .+ y ) ) ) $.
$d .(+) x y $.
$d B x y $.
$d G x y $.
$d T x y $.
$d U x y $.
$d V x y $.
$d X x y $.
